parameters.name: CharacterType
parameters.description:
The architecture of the instance. For more information, see [Overview](~~86132~~). Valid values:

*   **logic**: The instance is a cluster or read/write splitting instance.
*   **normal**: The instance is a standard master-replica instance.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform. Set the value to **DescribeParameterTemplates**.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine that is run on the instance. The value **Redis** is returned for this parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~60933~~) operation to query the IDs of instances.
